**Verify Email**: Request to verify email to complete registration.\n  - **Login Alert**: Notification of account access with details of time, date, and location.\n  - **Password Reset OTP**: Instructions to reset the password.\n  - **Password Reset Attempt**: Confirmation of successful password reset.\n  - **Team Member Invitation**: Invitation for a team member to join a workspace.\n  - **Team Member Invite Reminder**: Reminder to join a workspace.\n  - **Team Member Deactivation**: Notification of account deactivation.\n  - **Team Member Activation**: Notification of account reactivation.\n  - **Client Invitation**: Invitation for a client to join a project.\n\n- **Profile**\n  - **Enabled 2FA**: Confirmation of enabling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).\n  - **Disabled 2FA**: Confirmation of disabling 2FA.\n  - **Change Password**: Notification of a successful password change.\n  - **Workspace Disabled**: Notification of workspace deactivation.\n  - **Workspace Enabled**: Notification of workspace reactivation.\n\n- **Project Requests**\n  - **New Project Alert**: Notification of a new project request with details.\n\n- **Subscription**\n  - **Subscription Confirmation Email**: Confirmation of subscription activation.\n  - **Renewal Reminder Email**: Reminder to renew the subscription.\n  - **Payment Confirmation Email**: Confirmation of successful payment.\n  - **Subscription Cancellation Confirmation Email**: Confirmation of subscription cancellation.\n  - **Failed Payment Notification Email**: Notification of failed payment processing.\n\n#### Team Member - Notification Content\n- **Onboarding**\n  - **Project Invite**: Invitation to collaborate on a project.\n  - **Welcome Message**: Welcome to Wholistic and introduction to the project.\n\n- **Profile**\n  - **Enabled 2FA**: Confirmation of enabling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).\n  - **Disabled 2FA**: Confirmation of disabling 2FA.\n  - **Change Password**: Notification of a successful password change.\n\n- **Project Requests**\n  - **Project Request Update**: Update on project request approval or disapproval.\n\n- **Team Members**\n  - **Deactivated Team Member**: Notification of account deactivation.\n  - **Reactivation of a Team Member**: Notification of account reactivation.\n\n- **Project Notifications**\n  - **New Activity**: Notification of new activity in a project.\n  - **Comments**: Notification of new comments on a document.\n\n#### Platform Owner - Notifications Content\n- **Onboarding**\n  - **Welcome Message**: Welcome to Wholistic.\n\n- **Profile**\n  - **Enabled 2FA**: Confirmation of enabling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).\n  - **Disabled 2FA**: Confirmation of disabling 2FA.\n  - **Change Password**: Notification of a successful password change.\n\n- **Team Members**\n  - **Invite Team Member**: Invitation for a team member to join the platform.\n  - **Deactivate a Team Member**: Notification of account deactivation.\n  - **Activate a Team Member**: Notification of account reactivation.\n\n- **EOD Summary**: Summary of daily activities including new sign-ups, deactivated/activated organizations, subscriptions, and transaction details.\n\n### In-app Notification Content\n\n#### Organisation\n- **Onboarding**\n  - **Welcome Message**: Welcome to Wholistic.\n- **Project Request**\n  - **Project Request Update**: Notification of a new project request.\n- **Profile**\n  - **Enabled 2FA**: Confirmation of enabling Two-Factor Authentication (2FA).\n  - **Disabled 2FA**: Confirmation of disabling 2FA.\n\n#### Team Members\n- **Onboarding"
